description:
Tidy and packable, this cutting set makes outdoor meal prep easy. The do-it-all chef knife slices peppers or sausages precisely, and the oak cutting board provides a sturdy flat surface. The whole thing wraps up, which means there’s no loose knife floating in your packed camping kit.

  • Flexible stainless steel blade is reliable and lasts a long time
  • Oak handle with brass pins
  • Knife style excels at a variety of tasks
  • Cutting board is oak, which has a natural disinfectant property (that said, regular food safety rules still apply)
  • Poly-cotton roll is coated so you can wipe it clean
  • Blade length is 15cm
name: Primus Campfire Cutting Set
